data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 777,854 believers in Piauí and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Piauí, Brazil
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, help the 777,854 believers in Piauí to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Piauí to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Piauí to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 777,854 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Piauí, Brazil.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Piauí to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.section_summary:
the state of Piauí, Brazil has a population of 3,119,000.

We estimate Piauí has 777,854 people who might know Jesus, 2,022,394 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 318,752 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.
